mean_cn: n. 农场所有人，分得土地之定居者，自耕农
mean_en: someone who settles lawfully on government land with the intent to acquire title to it
sentence: Homesteaders live far away from cities, so they grow food on their own farms.
sentence_trans: 自耕农远离城市居住，因此他们在自家农场种植粮食。
word_etyma: home家园 ＋ stead稳定 ＋ er名词后缀 → homesteader农场所有人，自耕农
